channel.title: How to use hamachi with friend?
channel.description: how do i run a server that my friend can use to so me and my friend can play on hamachi. and can you explain every step after the downloading the server and downloading hamachi part? cause after that im lost like i can play on the server and he can to but we aint on together?

item.title: How to use hamachi with friend?
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

Client.java client sided, search

server=

Change the “127.0.0.1” to your hamachi ip.

Read full topic
